channel.title: Port Forwarding (easy way)
channel.description:
[b]Port Forwarding Made Easy[/b] [b]BY: X Andrew X[/b]
[b]Difficulty 2/10[/b] STEP 1 To start off you need to know your static IP address, if you know it already skip to step 2 1. Open up command prompt 2. Type in "ipconfig" and press enter and you should see something like this.(see below image)
[img]http://i34.tinypic.com/2cp9vnk.jpg[/img]
STEP 2 1. Type that Ip address in at the top of your screen. Example "127.0.0.1" <----(please don't use that address its just the local host) 2. It should ask you for a user name and password. If you have not changed it the default user name and password are "admin" 3. When you get on the site go to the top and click on gameing 4. You will see something like this. (see below image) 5. Name the application "RPSP" (Runescape Private Server) 6. Set the Start and the End to 43594 7. Set the protocol to Both and enter in a number under the ip address from 5-99 (I recommend 98)
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/befuhi.jpg[/img]
This has been and X Andrew X Guide. REP freely, I don't ask for REP like noobs =D
[b]I DO NOT GIVE PERMISION FOR ANYONE BUT ME TO USE THE PICTURES ON THIS GUIDE[/b] If the pictures don't show up here are the links [url=http://tinypic.com/r/befuhi/4]http://tinypic.com/r/befuhi/4[/url] [url=http://tinypic.com/2cp9vnk]http://tinypic.com/2cp9vnk[/url]

item.title: Port Forwarding (easy way)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

                                                          [b]Port Forwarding Made Easy[/b]
                                                                  [b]BY: X Andrew X[/b]

                                                                   [b]Difficulty 2/10[/b]

STEP 1
To start off you need to know your static IP address, if you know it already skip to step 2

  1. Open up command prompt
  2. Type in “ipconfig” and press enter and you should see something like this.(see below image)

STEP 2

  1. Type that Ip address in at the top of your screen. Example “127.0.0.1” <----(please don’t use that address its just the local host)
  2. It should ask you for a user name and password. If you have not changed it the default user name and password are “admin”
  3. When you get on the site go to the top and click on gameing
  4. You will see something like this. (see below image)
  5. Name the application “RPSP” (Runescape Private Server)
  6. Set the Start and the End to 43594
  7. Set the protocol to Both and enter in a number under the ip address from 5-99 (I recommend 98)

This has been and X Andrew X Guide.
REP freely, I don’t ask for REP like noobs =D

I DO NOT GIVE PERMISION FOR ANYONE BUT ME TO USE THE PICTURES ON THIS GUIDE
If the pictures don’t show up here are the links
http://tinypic.com/r/befuhi/4
http://tinypic.com/2cp9vnk

Read full topic
